attributes.action: Have one lesson a week dedicated to Life Skills for secondary students aged 15+
attributes.background: make it part of the school curriculum to teach secondary students aged 15+ ( year 10 +) one lesson per week on life skills for the future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular we're not sure what you mean by "life skills". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out more about the national curriculum and what is currently included here: https://www.gov.uk/national-curriculum
